Funky Pasta Omelette

Dish of the day. Omelettes aren't just for breakfast

Posted on: 11 Feb 2015

  •  Spread the word. 

Ingredients

  • 3 eggs
  • 3 small sardines
  • 1/4 chopped onion
  • 100g boiled spaghetti
  • 10g grated mature cheddar
  • 2 tbsp chopped green pepper
  • 1 tbsp chopped red bell pepper
  • 2 tbsp vegetable oil
  • 1 Maggi cube
  • Salt
  •  
  •  

Tips

Try replacing the sardines with tuna fish

Scotch bonnet chillies (ghost pepper) can be used instead of bell peppers to make the omelette more spicy.

Method

  1. Beat eggs, pasta and cheese in a bowl
  2. Mash the sardines with a fork and add to the eggy mixture. Sprinkle salt to taste
  3. Stir fry the chopped vegetables with the Maggi cube in a pan of hot oil for 2 - 3 minutes
  4. Add the egg mixture and make sure the pasta is evenly spread out in the pan
  5. Fry on low heat until the bottom is cooked
  6. Slide carefully unto a large plate in order to turn over without scattering the omelette
  7. Cook the other side on low heat until golden brown
  8. Serve with some garlic bread or fried plantains
